sentences.en: After that, his movies got more saccharine and predictable.
sentences.cn: 这以后, 他的电影变得越来越拖泥带水,情节也越来越一般.

sentences.en: And every time he kisses you it leaves behind the bitter taste of saccharine.
sentences.cn: 每次他亲吻你以后嘴角留下的只是一股苦涩的坏糖精味.

sentences.en: He had brought an envelope full of Victory Coffee and some saccharine tablets.
sentences.cn: 他带来个信封,装了胜利牌咖啡,还有几片糖精片.

sentences.en: I found the film far too saccharine.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这部电影太缠绵了.

sentences.en: I hated the movie’s saccharine ending.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌这部影片煽情的结尾。

sentences.en: Scratch Beginnings is certainly worth a read, especially if you want a little saccharine sweetness.
sentences.cn: 《白手起家》很值得一读, 尤其是如果你想得到一点并非哗众取宠的好办法.
她的笑里只有虚情假意的甜蜜.

sentences.en: Slumdog, then , is at best an attempt to cook a saccharine dish in a bitter sauce.
sentences.cn: 这部电影就像想用苦涩酱汁煮出一道甜点.

sentences.en: We used saccharine tablets in lieu of sugar.

words.tran_cn: [有化] 糖精；邻磺酰苯甲酰亚胺
含糖的；极甜的；和颜悦色的

trans.tran_cn: 故作多情的，甜得发腻的
